exception.monto_invalido: The amount must be a positive number.
exception.campos_tarjeta_vacios: All card fields must be completed.
exception.nombre_titular_invalido: The cardholder name must contain only letters.
exception.numero_tarjeta_invalido: The card number must contain 16 numeric digits.
exception.codigo_seguridad_invalido: The security code must be 3 digits long.
exception.vencimiento_formato_invalido: The expiration must be in MM/YY format.
